## TGl2ComponentRenderer type

Webgl2 renderer, without extensions by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TGl2ComponentRenderer<TExts extends TGlExtensionKeys = never> = TGlComponentRenderer<WebGL2RenderingContext, TExts>;
```
